MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the G66 postcode area of Auchinloch is still ongoing. This is due to poor ground conditions and we now expect power to be back on by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.54pm on Thursday 5th November 2020.
